properties.title: Northern Blvd
properties.alternativeRoute:
If you are on the street:
Take a Long Island City-bound Q63 bus (Northern Blvd and Broadway) to Jackson Av and Queens Plaza S for Queens Plaza E/M/R.
 
If you are on the platform: 
Take any train to Queens Plaza. Exit the station and cross Jackson Av to board a Flushing-bound Q63 bus (Jackson Av and Queens Blvd) to Northern Blvd and 54 St.
properties.description_custom: This elevator gets you from the street directly to Manhattan-bound M/R trains
